designation: Tier-10 Ignition and Verification Sweep Plan
description: Defines the final readiness checks, verification cadence, and ignition triggers for activating the GENESIS Tier-10 live runtime state after successful lock and attestation.

phase_1_readiness_verification.objective: Confirm all session locks, manifests, and integrity summaries are valid.
actions: Re-hash dual-signature attestation and confirm against Fusion Cell Law
phase_1_readiness_verification.success_condition: All hash and fusion law verifications return PASS

phase_2_fusion_validation_sweep.objective: Confirm cross-hub compliance under Fusion Cell Law

phase_3_harmonic_recalibration.objective: Equalize bias and variance across all active overlays before ignition.

phase_4_runtime_alignment.objective: Initialize live feedback loops between GENESIS → CORE → META_IS → RUNTIME.

meta.notes: Executing this protocol moves GENESIS from sealed state to live Tier-10 operation. All fusion and harmonic verifications must pass before ignition is authorized.
